explains: vt. 使丧失（bereave 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: Mr. Dinkins visited the bereaved family to offer comfort.
sentences.cn: 丁金斯先生拜访了丧失亲人的家庭，给予安慰。

sentences.en: The ceremony was an ordeal for those who had been recently bereaved.
sentences.cn: 这个仪式对于那些新近丧失亲友的人来说是一种折磨。

sentences.en: Therapists were brought in to counsel the bereaved.
sentences.cn: 请了治疗专家来劝慰死者的亲属。
